## Adapter type

Represents an image adapter.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type Adapter = {
  supports: (url: URL) => boolean;
  generateUrl: (input: GenerateUrlInput) => string;
  primeState?: (input: PrimeStateInput) => YootState;
};
```
